title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not change immediately.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a label with a specific font size.
2. Change the font size of the label.
Expected behavior: The label's height should adjust accordingly to justify the font size.
Observed behavior: The label's height remains the same even after the font size is modified.
OB: The label's height does not change when the font size is modified.
EB: The label's height should adjust to match the font size when it is modified.
SR:
1. Create a label with a specific font size.
2. Change the font size of the label.
3. Observe that the label's height does not adjust to match the font size.
